Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Penn in 1984...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/20/1984, off Sam Barnes (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/1984, off Kevin Crandell (SYR)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1986, hitting .369 with 7 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1986, hitting .552 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1988, hitting .381 with 3 HR, 24 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1989, hitting .413 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/14/1990 to a 5-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
